name: Variants - Wireframe Design System
description:
The Variants are a wireframe design system library with more than 850+ auto-layout resizing ready components gathered to the variants. Variants are ready to use for new projects from scratch.


Variants build without any hidden layers and in this case you can easily add or edit existed components. You can customize anything.

Save your time for creative tasks, build wireframes with Variants!

Can be easily changed to real UI.

- Made with Google fonts;

- Library of styles, typographies, effect etc.;

- Clear Structure;

- Free updates;

Most used elements for any type of design

(Alerts, Avatars, Badges, Buttons, Cards, Charts, Controls, Date and time, Forms, Sliders, Modals, Nav Bars, Menus, Notifications, Pop-ups, Segment controls, Tabs, Tables, Timelines, Tips, Toggles, Users and etc.)
